WRITING.TEXT: thanks, how do I use coconut oil? Will it remove the dust, and sweat that causes pimples? By the way, I'm a guy so I don't use make up haha
I didn't know this. Thanks What if my pimples start coming back. My old Facial cleanser did not do a good job of controlling it. Other products like Facial soap didn't do too well either

WRITING.TITLE: I stopped using Facial Cleanser and used Rubbing Alcohol. Is this bad?
WRITING.TEXT: I stopped using my Facial Cleanser around 4 months ago and I've been using rubbing alcohol which is 75% cheaper. I lost most of my pimples but arguably that could have been caused by other factors. It does a good job of cleaning my face but I'm not sure if there side effects or things that I should be aware of. The rubbing alcohol I use is 70% solution.
